detectors.description: LuckyDoubler.rand(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#95-101) uses a weak PRNG: "uint256((uint256(hashVal) / factor)) % max (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#100)"

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#103-105) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#104)

LuckyDoubler.changeFee(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#112-115) should emit an event for: 
	- fee = newFee (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#114)

LuckyDoubler.changeMultiplier(uint256) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#107-110) should emit an event for: 
	- multiplier = multi (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#109)

LuckyDoubler.changeOwner(address).newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#103) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#104)

Deprecated standard detected hashVal = uint256(block.blockhash(lastBlockNumber)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#98):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"
detectors.markdown:
Deprecated standard detected [hashVal = uint256(block.blockhash(lastBlockNumber))](shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#L98):
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#48-91):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#52)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance += (dValue * (100 - fee)) / 100 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#66)
	- entries.push(Entry(msg.sender,dValue,(dValue * multiplier) / 100,false)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#62)
	- unpaidEntries.push(entries.length - 1) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#64)
	- users[msg.sender].id = msg.sender (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#57)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits = 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#58)
	- users[msg.sender].payoutsReceived = 0 (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#59)
	- users[msg.sender].deposits ++ (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#63)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LuckyDoubler.join() (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#48-91):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - 1000000000000000000) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#52)
	- require(bool)(theEntry.entryAddress.send(payout)) (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#74)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balance -= payout (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#78)
	- theEntry.paid = true (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#75)
	- unpaidEntries[index] = unpaidEntries[unpaidEntries.length - 1] (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#81)
	- unpaidEntries.length -- (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#84)
	- users[theEntry.entryAddress].payoutsReceived ++ (shared/bad_randomness/lucky_doubler/lucky_doubler_2round.sol#76)
